attributes.action: To get Lord Mandelson to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I can't believe that a person who has resigned from his position twice already is now the Business Secretary. Who in their right mind appointed this man to this position? I think enough is enough. Why wait for him to resign again for making a mistake, when the mistake he would make could be very serious. This man should be in a much lower position in office, if in office at all!
